content.text:
# Kingswood Luas stop

| map_type           = Dublin
| services           =
}}
Kingswood () is a stop on the Luas light-rail tram system in Dublin, Ireland.  It opened in 2004 as a stop on the Red Line.  The stop is located on a section of reserved track at the side of the R383 road, near the Kingswood heights housing estate.
The stop is also served by Dublin Bus route 56A.
